title: Apple Wallet Integration
description: Add loyalty cards directly to Apple Wallet so they appear automatically when near a store.

title: Android App
description: Please make an Android version of Pocketz! My family uses both iOS and Android.

title: Scan receipts for automatic points
description: Allow scanning store receipts to automatically track earned points and rewards.

title: Mac App with Menu Bar widget
description: A Mac app that shows my cards in the menu bar for quick access when shopping online.

title: Dark mode for card display
description: When showing a barcode, have an option for dark background to save battery on OLED screens.

title: Share cards with non-Pocketz users
description: Generate a simple image or PDF of the barcode to share with people who don't have the app.
